# Interactive Atlas with shiny App 

## Keep adding features to your interactive Atlas! 

--

### Use `leaflet`

--

### Example

1. Select species (or colony)  
2. display species (or colony) on the map 
3. add a raster layer on the map 
4. draw a polygon around the colony (interactively) or compute a convex hull (programmatically)
5. Extract values
6. Display a histogram of values extracted (plus the mean)
